title: Wild Card Takeaways, McCarthy hired by Cowboys, Tua declares
itunes:title: Wild Card Takeaways, McCarthy hired by Cowboys, Tua declares
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis lead off the show discussing the news of Mike McCarthy being hired as the Cowboys head coach (1:35) and Alabama QB Tua Tagovailoa declaring for the 2020 NFL Draft (11:18). Then, the guys recap the Wild Card Round games, including the Texans win over the Bills (21:12), the Titans dominating rush game beating the Patriots (30:40), Vikings OT thriller over the Saints in the Superdome (35:56) and the Seahawks win over the Eagles (46:04).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
